name: denali-icons
description: Denali Icons library consisting of 1000+ icons packaged into a font, SVG, sprite, and JS library.

scripts.font: rm -rf dist/font && mkdir dist/font && fantasticon -o dist/font -n denali-icons-font -t woff2 -g css --selector .d-icon -p d svg
scripts.icons: rm -rf dist/icons && mkdir dist/icons && cp -R svg dist

author: Chas Turansky <chas@turansky.net> (http://turansky.net/)
